articles.content: A "ring of fire," or annular solar eclipse, will be visible from eight US states on Oct. 14, 2023 the first time such a celestial view was available in North America. During the event, sky-watchers a… [+3197 chars]

articles.description: Earendel shines from 28 billion light-years away.
